Verses: 1 pinbu Isravel Puththirar Prayaanam Panni, Erigovin Kitta Irukkum Yordhaanukku Ikkaraiyile Movaapin Samanaana Veligalil Paalayamiranginaargal.
2 isravelar Emoriyarukku Seydha Yaavaiyum Sipporin Kumaaranaagiya Paalaak Kandaan.
3 janangal Eraalamaayirundhapadiyinaal, Movaap Migavum Payandhu, Isravel Puththirarinimiththam Kalakkamadaindhu,

4 meedhiyaaniyarin Moopparai Nokki: Maadu Veliyin Pullai Meygiradhupola, Ippozhudhu Indhak Koottam Nammai Sutriyirukkira Yaavaiyum Meyndhupodum Endraan. Akkaalaththile Sipporin Kumaaranaagiya Paalaak Movaapiyarukku Raajaavaayirundhaan.

5 avan Peyorin Kumaaranaagiya Pileyaamai Azhaiththuvarumbadi, Than Sandhadhiyaarudaiya Dhesaththil Nadhiyarugeyulla Peththoorukku Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi: Egipthilirundhu Oru Janakkoottam Vandhirukkiradhu; Avargal Boomiyin Visaalaththai Moodi, Enakku Edhire Irangiyirukkiraargal.

6 avargal Ennilum Balavaangal; Aagilum, Neer Aaseervadhikkiravan Aaseervadhikkappattavan, Neer Sabikkiravan Sabikkappattavan Endru Ariven; Aadhalaal, Neer Vandhu, Enakkaaga Andha Janaththai Sabikkavendum; Appozhudhu Oruvelai Naan Avargalai Muriya Adiththu, Avargalai Iththesaththilirundhu Thuraththividalaam Endru Sollachchonnaan.
7 appadiye Movaapin Moopparum Meedhiyaanin Moopparum Kurisolludhalukkuriya Kooliyaith Thangal Kaiyil Eduththukkondu Purappattu, Pileyaamidaththil Poi, Paalaakin Vaarththaigalai Avanukku Sonnaargal.
8 avan Avargalai Nokki: Raaththirikku Inge Thangiyirungal; Karththar Enakku Sollugirapadiye Ungalukku Uththaravu Koduppen Endraan; Appadiye Movaapin Prabukkal Pileyaamidaththil Thanginaargal.
9 dhevan Pileyaamidaththil Vandhu: Unnidaththilirukkira Indha Manidhar Yaar Endraar.
10 pileyaam Dhevanai Nokki: Sipporin Kumaaranaagiya Paalaak Ennum Movaapin Raajaa Avargalai Ennidaththukku Anuppi:

11 boomiyin Visaalaththai Moodugira Oru Janakkoottam Egipthilirundhu Vandhirukkiradhu; Aagaiyaal, Nee Vandhu Enakkaaga Avargalai Sabikkavendum; Appozhudhu Naan Avargalode Yuththam Panni, Oruvelai Avargalaith Thuraththividalaam Endru Sollachchonnaan Endraan.
12 adharkuth Dhevan Pileyaamai Nokki: Nee Avargalode Pogavendaam; Andha Janangalai Sabikkavum Vendaam; Avargal Aaseervadhikkappattavargal Endraar.

13 pileyaam Kaalame Ezhundhu, Paalaakin Prabukkalai Nokki: Neengal Ungal Dhesaththirkup Poividungal; Naan Ungalodekooda Varugiradharkuk Karththar Enakku Uththaravu Kodukkamaattom Engiraar Endru Sonnaan.
14 appadiye Movaapiyarudaiya Prabukkal Ezhundhu, Paalaakinidaththil Poi: Pileyaam Engalode Varamaatten Endru Sonnaan Endraargal.
15 paalaak Marupadiyum Avargalilum Ganavaangalaana Adhiga Prabukkalai Anuppinaan.
16 avargal Pileyaamidaththil Poi, Avanai Nokki: Sipporin Kumaaranaagiya Paalaak Engalai Anuppi: Neer Ennidaththil Varugiradharkuth Thadaipadavendaam;
17 ummai Migavum Ganampannuven; Neer Solvadhaiyellaam Seyven; Neer Vandhu Enakkaaga Andha Janangalai Sabikkavendum Endru Sollachchonnaar Endraargal.

18 pileyaam Paalaakin Oozhiyakkaararukku Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Paalaak Enakkuth Than Veedu Niraiya Velliyum Ponnum Thandhaalum, Siriya Kaariyamaanaalum Periyakaariyamaanaalum Seyyumporuttu, En Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Kattalaiyai Naan Meerak Koodaadhu.
19 aagilum, Karththar Inimel Enakku Enna Solluvaar Enbadhai Naan Ariyumpadikku Neengalum Indha Raaththiri Inge Thangiyirungal Endraan.
20 iravile Dhevan Pileyaamidaththil Vandhu: Andha Manidhar Unnaik Kooppida Vandhirundhaal, Nee Avargalode Koodappo; Aanaalum Naan Unakku Sollum Vaarththaiyinpadimaaththiram Nee Seyyavendum Endraar.
21 pileyaam Kaalame Ezhundhu, Than Kazhudhaiyinmel Senankatti, Movaapin Prabukkalodekoodap Ponaan.

22 avan Pogiradhinaale Dhevanukkuk Kobam Moondadhu; Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Vazhiyile Avanukku Edhiraaliyaaga Nindraar. Avan Than Kazhudhaiyin Mel Eripponaan; Avan Velaikkaarar Iranduperum Avanode Irundhaargal.

23 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Uruvina Pattayaththaith Thammudaiya Kaiyile Pidiththukkondu Vazhiyile Nirkiradhaik Kazhudhai Kandu, Vazhiyai Vittu Vayalile Vilagippoyitru; Kazhudhaiyai Vazhiyil Thiruppa Pileyaam Adhai Adiththaan.
24 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Irupuraththilum Suvar Vaiththirundha Dhraatchath Thottangalin Paadhaiyile Poi Nindraar.
25 kazhudhai Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaikkandu, Suvar Oramaai Odhungi, Pileyaamin Kaalai Suvarode Nerukkitru; Thirumbavum Adhai Adiththaan.
26 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Appuram Poi, Valadhupuram Idadhupuram Vilaga Vazhiyillaadha Idukkamaana Idaththile Nindraar.
27 kazhudhai Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaik Kandu, Pileyaamin Keezhp Paduththukkondadhu; Pileyaam Kobam Moondavanaagi, Kazhudhaiyaith Thadiyinaal Adiththaan.
28 udane Karththar Kazhudhaiyin Vaayaith Thirandhaar; Adhu Pileyaamaip Paarththu: Neer Ennai Ippozhudhu Moondru Tharam Adikkumpadi Naan Umakku Enna Seydhen Endradhu.
29 appozhudhu Pileyaam Kazhudhaiyaip Paarththu: Nee Ennaip Pariyaasam Pannikkondu Varugiraai; En Kaiyil Oru Pattayammaaththiram Irundhaal, Ippozhudhe Unnaik Kondrupoduven Endraan.

30 kazhudhai Pileyaamai Nokki: Neer Ennaik Kaikkonda Kaalamudhal Innaalvaraikkum Neer Erina Kazhudhai Naan Allavaa? Ippadi Umakku Eppodhaagilum Naan Seydhadhu Undaa Endradhu. Adharku Avan: Illai Endraan.

31 appozhudhu Karththar Pileyaamin Kangalaith Thirandhaar; Vazhiyile Nindru Uruvina Pattayaththaith Thammudaiya Kaiyile Pidiththirukkira Thoodhanaik Kandu, Thalaikunindhu Mugankuppura Vizhundhu Panindhaan.
32 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Avanai Nokki: Nee Un Kazhudhaiyai Idhanode Moondrudharam Adiththadhenna? Un Vazhi Enakku Maarupaadaayirukkiradhinaal, Naan Unakku Edhiriyaagap Purappattu Vandhen.
33 kazhudhai Ennaik Kandu, Indha Moondru Tharam Enakku Vilagitru; Enakku Vilagaamal Irundhadhaanaal, Ippozhudhu Naan Unnai Kondrupottu, Kazhudhaiyai Uyirode Vaippen Endraar.

34 appozhudhu Pileyaam Karththarudaiya Thoodhanai Nokki: Naan Paavancheydhen; Vazhiyile Neer Enakku Edhiraaga Nirkiradhai Ariyaadhirundhen; Ippozhudhum Umadhu Paarvaikku Idhu Thagaadhadhaayirukkumaanaal, Naan Thirumbip Poividugiren Endraan.

35 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Pileyaamai Nokki: Andha Manidharode Koodappo; Naan Unnode Sollum Vaarththaiyaimaaththiram Nee Sollakkadavaai Endraar; Appadiye Pileyaam Paalaakin Prabukkalodekoodap Ponaan.
36 pileyaam Varugiradhaip Paalaak Kettamaaththiraththil, Kadaisi Ellaiyaana Arnon Nadhiyin Oraththilulla Movaapin Pattanamattum Avanukku Edhirkondu Ponaan.
37 paalaak Pileyaamai Nokki: Ummai Azhaikkumpadi Naan Aavalode Ummidaththil Aal Anuppavillaiyaa? Ennidaththirku Varaamal Irundhadhenna? Etrapragaaramaaga Ummai Naan Ganam Pannamaattenaa Endraan.
38 appozhudhu Pileyaam Paalaagai Nokki: Idho, Ummidaththirku Vandhen; Aanaalum Edhaagilum Sollugiradharku Ennaale Aagumo? Dhevan En Vaayile Alikkum Vaarththaiyaiye Solluven Endraan.
39 pileyaam Paalaakudanekoodap Ponaan; Avargal Keeriyaadh Oosoththil Serndhaargal.
40 ange Paalaak Aadumaadugalai Adiththu, Pileyaamukkum Avanodirundha Prabukkalukkum Anuppinaan.
41 marunaal Kaalame Paalaak Pileyaamaik Koottikkondu, Avanaip Paagaaludaiya Medugalil Erappanninaan; Avvidaththilirundhu Pileyaam Janaththin Kadaisip Paalayaththaip Paarththaan.
